mapper.select:
select t1.*,ku.userName from kms_up_class_record t1 left join kms_user ku on t1.user_code = ku.user_code
and t1.user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.sql: id, up_date, new_class, old_class, up_note, user_code, up_user
mapper.insert:
insert into kms_up_class_record
up_date,
new_class,
old_class,
up_note,
user_code,
up_user,
#{upDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{newClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{oldClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{upNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update kms_up_class_record
up_date = #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
new_class = #{newClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
old_class = #{oldClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_note = #{upNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_user = #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update kms_up_class_record set up_date = #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, new_class = #{newClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_class = #{oldClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_note = #{upNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_user = #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
